short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using ChatGPT LLM AI to extract data information such as numbers, dates, ratios, etc. from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Use the ChatGPT LLM AI tool to analyze web content.

2. Identify data information in the web content, including numbers, dates, currencies, percentages, units, etc.

3. Based on summarizing and extracting the collected data information from the web content, reorganize and analyze it to form a brief data report.

4. For time and date information, organize specific time and description information along a timeline to create a concise timeline report.

5. Provide analysis methods and suggestions for these related data on the webpage.

6. Overall, help users quickly understand the mentioned time and data situations on the webpage to enhance reading efficiency.

7. Finally, users can directly copy the output report content as their own analytical reference for storage in other notes.
